properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 29 at 3:03PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has reissued a Flood Warning for the
Tennessee River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Tennessee River at Savannah
* from Tuesday March 3 until further notice.
* At 2 PM Saturday the stage was...370.4 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 370.0 feet.
* The river is slowly falling now but with the expected rainfall
it will jump up quickly beginning Monday night and will continue
rising to near 377.0 feet by Saturday March 07. Additional rises
may be possible thereafter.
* At 377.0 feet...Wayne Jerrolds River Park boat launch parking lot
is totally flooded.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
